siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
blogPost.body: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
blogPost.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions
blogPost.author: M. Brook

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題

previous.excerpt: One of life’s most enjoyable moments is finding new favorite songs, but this is often a solo experience. We analyze you and a friend's Spotify listening histories to curate a playlist full of recommended songs made just for the two of you to Discover Together.
previous.title: Discover Together - Spotify Discover playlist curated for 2 people with AI

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的时刻之一就是寻找新的喜爱的歌曲，但这往往是一个人的体验。我们会分析你和朋友的Spotify听歌记录，为你们两个人精心策划一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推荐歌曲，让你们一起发现。
localize.tagline: Spotify发现用AI为2人策划的播放列表。

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的時刻之一就是尋找新的喜愛的歌曲，但這往往是一個人的體驗。我們會分析你和朋友的Spotify聽歌記錄，爲你們兩個人精心策劃一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推薦歌曲，讓你們一起發現。
localize.tagline: Spotify發現用AI爲2人策劃的播放列表。

next.excerpt: Aqueux is a collection of ultra high-resolution dynamic wallpapers, inspired by an OS X classic — available in several wide-gamut color editions, with easy installation on macOS, and a free set available for mobile devices.
next.title: Aqueux Wallpapers - A collection of dynamic wallpapers, for desktop and mobile

localize.description: Aqueux是一个超高分辨率动态壁纸的集合，灵感来自于OS X的经典之作--有几个宽广的gamut颜色版本，可在macOS上轻松安装，并为移动设备提供免费套装。
localize.tagline: 一系列动态壁纸，适用于桌面和手机。

localize.description: Aqueux是一個超高分辨率動態壁紙的集合，靈感來自於OS X的經典之作--有幾個寬廣的gamut顏色版本，可在macOS上輕鬆安裝，併爲移動設備提供免費套裝。
localize.tagline: 一系列動態壁紙，適用於桌面和手機。
